ArbitraryControl.desc: A class representing most ahk GUI control types.

args.name: guiHwnd
args.desc: The hwnd of the gui that the GuiControl should be added to.

args.name: type
args.desc: The type of the control. Can be `Text, Edit, UpDown, Picture, Button, Checkbox, DropDownList, ComboBox, ListBox, Link, Hotkey, DateTime, MonthCal, Slider, Progress, GroupBox and ActiveX`. For `Radio, ListView, TreeView, Tab3 and StatusBar` see [AdditionalControls](AdditionalControls).

args.name: options
args.desc: The options that the GuiControl will be created with. Does not accept vVars.

args.name: text
args.desc: The text that the GuiControl will be created with.

args.name: DPIScale
args.desc: Whether or not to correct for non standard dpi.
